title: IMPRESSIVE LUXURY COMMUNITY ON THE WATER!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Come home to an oasis where you can savor gentle breezes under the warmth of the sun.
Sand Cove offers waterfront living with spacious 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans, complete with beautifully appointed kitchens.
large private patios and balconies offering stunning bay views, walk-in closets, and hardwood floors.

Experience the beauty outside of your home as well, with ample community features including two sparkling swimming pools, lighted sand volleyball and tennis courts, ping pong tables, billiards tables, cardio and strength training center, and a luxury resident lounge.

Sand Cove is a Certified Sustainable Property recognized by the Institute of Real Estate Management (IREM) for resource efficiency and responsible programs that support environmental quality for its residents.
Redefine the way you live by finding your new home at Sand Cove, contact us today to schedule your personalized tour!
